concept.title: Replace or Edit the Account Overview Page

conbody.p: You can replace or edit the account overview (overview.php) page so that users can view their support questions and content recommendations. Your users can also update their account settings, change their password, manage answer notifications, and manage content type notifications using the account overview page.

You can implement Knowledge Advanced notifications on the account overview page using either of the following methods:
Replace the overview page in your current instance with the reference implementation overview page.
Edit the overview page in your current instance to include code from the reference implementation overview page.
